Basic Configuration: ### site: datadoghq.com## dd_url: https://app.datadoghq.com## proxy:#   https: http://<USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>@<PROXY_SERVER_FOR_HTTPS>:<PORT>#   http: http://<USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>@<PROXY_SERVER_FOR_HTTP>:<PORT>#   no_proxy:#     - <HOSTNAME-1>#     - <HOSTNAME-2>## skip_ssl_validation: false## force_tls_12: false## hostname: <HOSTNAME_NAME>## hostname_file: /var/lib/cloud/data/instance-id## hostname_fqdn: false## host_aliases:#   - <ALIAS-1>#   - <ALIAS-2>## tags:#   - environment:dev#   - <TAG_KEY>:<TAG_VALUE>## env: <environment name>## tag_value_split_separator:#   <TAG_KEY>: <SEPARATOR>## checks_tag_cardinality: low## dogstatsd_tag_cardinality: low## histogram_aggregates:#   - max#   - median#   - avg#   - count## histogram_percentiles:#   - "0.95"## histogram_copy_to_distribution: false## histogram_copy_to_distribution_prefix: "<PREFIX>"## aggregator_stop_timeout: 2## The default buffer size for the aggregator use a sane value for most of the# use cases, however, it could be useful to manually set it in order to trade# RSS usage with better performances.## aggregator_buffer_size: 100## forwarder_timeout: 20## forwarder_retry_queue_payloads_max_size: 15728640## forwarder_num_workers: 1## forwarder_stop_timeout: 2## forwarder_storage_max_size_in_bytes: 50000000## forwarder_storage_max_disk_ratio: 0.95## forwarder_outdated_file_in_days: 10## cloud_provider_metadata:#   - "aws"#   - "gcp"#   - "azure"#   - "alibaba"## collect_ec2_tags: false## ec2_metadata_timeout: 300## ec2_prefer_imdsv2: false## collect_gce_tags: true## exclude_gce_tags:#   - "kube-env"#   - "kubelet-config"#   - "containerd-configure-sh"#   - "startup-script"#   - "shutdown-script"#   - "configure-sh"#   - "sshKeys"#   - "ssh-keys"#   - "user-data"#   - "cli-cert"#   - "ipsec-cert"#   - "ssl-cert"#   - "google-container-manifest"#   - "bosh_settings"## gce_send_project_id_tag: false## gce_metadata_timeout: 1000## azure_hostname_style: "os"## flare_stripped_keys:#   - "sensitive_key_1"#   - "sensitive_key_2"## no_proxy_nonexact_match: false## use_proxy_for_cloud_metadata: false## python_version: 2
Advanced Configuration: ## confd_path: ""## additional_checksd: <CHECKD_FOLDER_PATH>## expvar_port: 5000## cmd_port: 5001## GUI_port: <GUI_PORT>## health_port: 0## check_runners: 4## enable_metadata_collection: true## enable_gohai: true## server_timeout: 15## procfs_path: <PROCFS_PATH>## disable_py3_validation: false### python3_linter_timeout: 120## memtrack_enabled: true## tracemalloc_debug: false## tracemalloc_include: <TRACEMALLOC_EXCLUDE>## tracemalloc_exclude: <TRACEMALLOC_INCLUDE>## windows_use_pythonpath: false## secret_backend_command: <COMMAND_PATH>## secret_backend_arguments:#   - <ARGUMENT_1>#   - <ARGUMENT_2>## secret_backend_output_max_size: 1048576## secret_backend_timeout: 30## secret_backend_skip_checks: false## snmp_listener:  #  # workers: 2  #  # discovery_interval: 3600  #  # discovery_allowed_failures: 3  #  # configs:    #    # - network_address: <NETWORK>    #    # ignored_ip_addresses:    #   - <IP_ADDRESS_1>    #   - <IP_ADDRESS_2>    #    # port: 161    #    # snmp_version: <VERSION>    #    # timeout: 5    #    # retries: 3    #    # community_string: '<COMMUNITY>'    #    # user: <USERNAME>    #    # authKey: <AUTHENTICATION_KEY>    #    # authProtocol: <AUTHENTICATION_PROTOCOL>    #    # privKey: <PRIVACY_KEY>    #    # privProtocol: <PRIVACY_PROTOCOL>    #    # context_name: <CONTEXT_NAME>    #    # ad_identifier: snmp    #    # loader: core## internal_profiling:#  #  # enabled: false
Log collection Configuration: ## logs_enabled: false## logs_config:  #  # container_collect_all: false  #  # logs_dd_url: <ENDPOINT>:<PORT>  #  # logs_no_ssl: false  #  # processing_rules:  #   - type: <RULE_TYPE>  #     name: <RULE_NAME>  #     pattern: <RULE_PATTERN>  #  # use_http: true  #  # use_tcp: true  #  # use_compression: true  #  # compression_level: 6  #  # batch_wait: 5
Trace Collection Configuration: ## apm_config:  #  # enabled: true  #  # env: none  #  # receiver_port: 8126  #  # receiver_socket: <UNIX_SOCKET_PATH>  #  # apm_non_local_traffic: false  #  # apm_dd_url: <ENDPOINT>:<PORT>  #  # extra_sample_rate: 1.0  #  # max_traces_per_second: 10  #  # max_events_per_second: 200  #  # max_memory: 500000000  #  # max_cpu_percent: 50  #  # obfuscation:  #     <OBFUSCATION_CONFIGURATION>  #  # filter_tags:  #     require: [<LIST_OF_KEY_VALUE_TAGS>]  #     reject: [<LIST_OF_KEY_VALUE_TAGS>]  #  # replace_tags:  #   - name: "<TAG_NAME>"  #     pattern: "<REGEX_PATTERN>"  #     repl: "<PATTERN_TO_INLINE>"  #  # ignore_resources: ["(GET|POST) /healthcheck"]  #  # log_file: <APM_LOG_FILE_PATH>  #  # log_throttling: true  #  # internal_profiling:  #    #    # enabled: false

DogStatsD Configuration: ## use_dogstatsd: true## dogstatsd_port: 8125## bind_host: localhost## dogstatsd_socket: ""## dogstatsd_origin_detection: false## dogstatsd_buffer_size: 8192## dogstatsd_non_local_traffic: false## dogstatsd_stats_enable: false## dogstatsd_queue_size: 1024## dogstatsd_stats_buffer: 10## dogstatsd_stats_port: 5000## dogstatsd_so_rcvbuf: 0## dogstatsd_metrics_stats_enable: false## dogstatsd_tags:#   - <TAG_KEY>:<TAG_VALUE>### dogstatsd_mapper_profiles:#   - name: <PROFILE_NAME>                        # e.g. "airflow", "consul", "some_database"#     prefix: <PROFILE_PREFIX>                    # e.g. "airflow.", "consul.", "some_database."#     mappings:#       - match: <METRIC_TO_MATCH>                # e.g. `test.job.duration.*` to match `test.job.duration.my_job_name`#         match_type: <MATCH_TYPE>                # e.g. `wildcard` or `regex`#         name: <MAPPED_METRIC_NAME>              # e.g. `test.job.duration`#         tags:#           <TAG_KEY>: <TAG_VALUE_TO_EXPAND>      # e.g. `job_name: "$1"`, $1 is replaced by value capture by *#       - match: 'test.worker.*.*.start_time'     # to match `test.worker.<worker_type>.<worker_name>.start_time`#         name: 'test.worker.start_time'#         tags:#           worker_type: '$1'#           worker_name: '$2'#       - match: 'test\.task\.duration\.(\w+)\.(.*)'     # no need to escape in yaml context using single quote#         match_type: regex#         name: 'test.task'#         tags:#           task_type: '$1'#           task_name: '$2'## dogstatsd_mapper_cache_size: 1000## dogstatsd_entity_id_precedence: false## statsd_forward_host: ""## statsd_forward_port: 0## statsd_metric_namespace: ""## metadata_providers:#   - name: k8s#     interval: 60
JMX Configuration: ## jmx_custom_jars:#   - /jmx-jars/jboss-cli-client.jar## jmx_use_cgroup_memory_limit: false## jmx_use_container_support: false## jmx_log_file: <JMXFETCH_LOG_FILE_PATH>## jmx_max_restarts: 3## jmx_restart_interval: 5## jmx_check_period: 15000## jmx_thread_pool_size: 3## jmx_collection_timeout: 60## jmx_reconnection_thread_pool_size: 3## jmx_reconnection_timeout: 60
Logging Configuration: ## log_level: 'info'## log_file: <AGENT_LOG_FILE_PATH>## log_format_json: false## log_to_console: true## disable_file_logging: false## log_file_max_size: 10MB## log_file_max_rolls: 1## log_to_syslog: false## syslog_uri: <SYSLOG_URI>## syslog_rfc: false## syslog_pem: <PEM_CERTIFICATE_PATH>## syslog_key: <PEM_KEY_PATH>## syslog_tls_verify: true## log_format_rfc3339: false## log_all_goroutines_when_unhealthy: false
Autoconfig Configuration: ## autoconf_template_dir: /datadog/check_configs## config_providers:#  - name: kubelet#    polling: true#  - name: docker#    polling: true#  - name: clusterchecks#    grace_time_seconds: 60#  - name: kube_services#    polling: true#  - name: etcd#    polling: true#    template_dir: /datadog/check_configs#    template_url: http://127.0.0.1#    username:#    password:#  - name: consul#    polling: true#    template_dir: datadog/check_configs#    template_url: http://127.0.0.1#    ca_file:#    ca_path:#    cert_file:#    key_file:#    username:#    password:#    token:#  - name: zookeeper#    polling: true#    template_dir: /datadog/check_configs#    template_url: 127.0.0.1#    username:#    password:## extra_config_providers:#   - clusterchecks## autoconfig_exclude_features:#  - cloudfoundry#  - containerd#  - cri#  - docker#  - ecsfargate#  - eksfargate#  - kubernetes#  - orchestratorexplorer## autoconfig_include_features:#  - cloudfoundry#  - containerd#  - cri#  - docker#  - ecsfargate#  - eksfargate#  - kubernetes#  - orchestratorexplorer
